title: Yodo River
marks:
Signature, Title, Inscription, and Seal

Margin: LLC, in grey: [Yodo River]; LRC, in pencil: [Toshi
description: wide river with bridge in background; 4 boats tethered at LL of image, a human figure working in the furthest boat from shore; tree and grass lined banks at L with a few buildings in background
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
